name: Hero No Hands
description:
Hero no Hands

You belong to the NO HANDS TRIBE. you must fight your way from the evil monsters

but they are invisible . you must SACRIFICE your TRIBE MEMBERS in order to find the enemies and kill them.

enemies duplicate if they see you.

Instructions----

press s to sacrifice a tribe member and find the enemy

press a s or arrow keys to move

press space to jump 

press left mouse button to shoot bullets in the direction 90 degrees from you cursor.

enjoyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy
